alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 11:27AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ROBESON...NORTHWESTERN DILLON...NORTHEASTERN DARLINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN MARLBORO COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EST... At 1127 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Brownsville, or 13 miles northeast of Darlington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke, Maxton, Mccoll, Rowland, Clio, Raemon, Hamer, Brownsville, Oak Grove, South Of The Border, Bingham, Purvis, Prospect, Dunbar, Little Rock, Minturn, Elrod, Blenheim, Mcdonald, and Tatum. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 176 and 177, and between mile markers 187 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
